io.mangoo.helpers.cookie

Class CookieBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mangoo.helpers.cookie.CookieBuilder
  • Deprecated. 
    As of 4.12.0 without replacement, will be removed in 5.0.0 Use Cookie cookie = new CookieImpl() from io.undertow.server.handlers instead

    @Deprecated
public class CookieBuilder
extends Object
    Author:
    svenkubiak, WilliamDunne
